list.bullet:
Error
TypeError ~(Parameter Parsing Errors)~ ValueError ~(Non-User Input Programming Errors)~ DateError ~(Corrupted Data)~
DateObjectError ~(Non-Initialised Parents, or Wrong Comparisons)~ DateRangeError ~(Out-of-Range on 32-bit)~

Exception
DateException
DateInvalidTimeZoneException DateInvalidOperationException ~(Using Relative Time For Subtraction)~ DateMalformedStringException DateMalformedIntervalStringException DateMalformedPeriodStringException
